definitions.definition: A Eurasian and African songbird , Luscinia megarhynchos , family Muscicapidae , famed for its beautiful singing at night; a common nightingale .

main_definition: A Eurasian and African songbird , Luscinia megarhynchos , family Muscicapidae , famed for its beautiful singing at night; a common nightingale .

definitions.definition: A kind of flannel scarf with sleeves , formerly worn by invalids when sitting up in bed .

main_definition: A kind of flannel scarf with sleeves , formerly worn by invalids when sitting up in bed .
